name: Smurf: Rescue in Gargamel's Castle
overview: Smurf Rescue in Gargamel’s Castle, published in 1982 by Coleco for the ColecoVision console, is an action game that you can compare with the classical Konami’s Athetic Land and Cabbage Patch Kids. After a 1st work based on the Portuguese version of Engesoft, GDX made a better conversion for the MSX system, by basing his work on the Mission emulator, with SCC sound by default and improved support for keyboard and joystick.
